name: Comet Dodger
description:
A game made for P1X's "Hangover Game Jam 2016", the 1st of January 2016, where the topic was comet.

A tiny game where you are controlling a planet trough an endless storm of comets, with the goal being keeping your planet alive for as long time as possible.

This is a reupload from my other itch account, to keep everything in one place.
